name: VR Maze (itch) (I am Fabii)
description:
VR Maze

Goal: Collect cubes and bring them to one of the delivery zones, but be aware of traps. There are 4 cubes in total and 3 delivery zones.

Only designed to be playable with VR. To enter VR, click on the button at the bottom right corner of the game window after starting the game.

If you somehow spawn in a void when entering VR and don't get teleported away, reload the game and enter VR in the first 5 seconds - you should be teleported after that.

Controls: 
Moving: Left Thumbpad
Picking Up: Right/Left Grip Button

Note: There are no collisions for the walls.
